item.title: Trump admin live updates: Hegseth says admiral ordered 2nd strike on boat
item.description: Trump is also set to make an announcement at 2 p.m. ET, the White House said.

item.title: WATCH: Before and after videos show devastation in Ukraine
item.description: Intense fighting has been happening for weeks in the city of Pokrovsk.

item.title: WATCH: Pope Leo prays at site of deadly 2020 Beirut port blast
item.description: The Pope also met with families of people who were killed in the explosion.

item.title: WATCH: Woman attempts to pet and feed bear in Tennessee
item.description: A woman in Gatlinburg, Tennessee, demonstrated exactly what not to do when encountering a bear in the wild.

item.title: WATCH: Rescuers save men clinging to trees amid deadly flooding in Indonesia
item.description: Search and rescue crews saved two men found clinging to trees amid deadly flooding on Indonesia's Sumatra island.
